title: Steak with Marsala sauce
ingredients: ['1 (500g) (2.5cm thick) boneless sirloin steak', 'knob butter', '75g sliced mushrooms', '85g sliced onion', '75ml dry Marsala', '60ml water', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 1/2 teaspoons beef boullion or concentrated stock', '1 pinch ground black pepper']
